lines.text: Presently I shall assume a state of trance, in which the outer mind merges with the astral portion of the human ego... the Spirit of Evil is trying to enter this room, but have no fear, the fires of death will guard us.

[to a contestant]
Now, wh-what;s the difference between a weasel, an easel, and a measle? What's a measle? Go ahead and break out with it.

[to Janis]
How about a short rhumba and a long Cuba libre?

[Looking about the room cluttered with many exotic bric-a-brac]
Who decorated this room - Robert Ripley?
We have our business and you have your business.

[Affronted]
Please do not refer to my calling as a business.
Oh, no offense, I just meant that everybody has to stick to his own racket.

[Insulted]
Racket? Do you dare to suggest that the practice of the occult sciences is a racket?
Do not merely suggest it, Mr. Kyser. Insist upon it.

[Rhetorically]
Why do I have to waste my time outwitting morons?
Presently I shall assume a state of trance in which the higher mind merges with the astral portion of the human ego.
I wish it was the plane for Los Angeles.
